minimumAmountTitle: Minimum Amount To Reserve in Account
deleteModalTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
informationModal: The auto fill feature will automatically populate savings or debt with remaining leftover income after all expenses are paid for each budget cycle.
informationModal1: This is the minimum amount to keep in your account after expenses. Auto fill will input remaining income over this amount to savings or debt. This amount should be minimal as all expenses and personal spending will be accounted for.

SignUpScreen.Title: Create an account
SignUpScreen.passwordErrorUppercase: Password must have at least one Uppercase Character.
SignUpScreen.passwordErrorLowercase: Password must have at least one Lowercase Character.
SignUpScreen.passwordErrorDigit: Password must contain at least one Digit.

ForgotPasswordScreen.Detail: Enter your email for the verification process, we will send 4 a digit code to your email.

OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding1: Create a customized budget that follows your pay schedule. By safely allocating money within your income, there’s no need to worry about overspending.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding2: Add single or multiple streams of income, fixed or variable.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding3: Have extra money in your account after paying bills? Let’s knock out some debt! Automatically allocate remaining funds toward paying off debt. Prioritize which debt you’d like to focus on paying off.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding4: Input your current savings and track your progress toward reaching your goal. Savings is a bucket that can be used to focus on building your emergency fund or as a sinking fund to set money aside for a future purchase. Auto save is a fantastic feature that automatically allocates any money leftover after expenses toward saving. With a quick glance at your budget, you can see exactly how much money you can safely move toward your savings while making sure your bills are covered.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding5: View a breakdown of your spending, debt and savings progress. See projected dates for reaching savings goals or paying off debt.
OnBoardingScreen.onBoarding6: Add your expenses to see what bills are due each pay cycle. Got an oil change coming up? Need new tires? Use the one-time expense feature to include irregular expenses.
OnBoardingScreen.modalTitle: Do you want to see how better budget works?
